mapper.select: select t.TABLE_SCHEMA db,t.TABLE_NAME tableName,t.TABLE_COMMENT tableComment,c.COLUMN_NAME columnName, c.DATA_TYPE dataType,IFNULL(c.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH,c.NUMERIC_PRECISION) colLength, c.NUMERIC_SCALE scale, c.COLUMN_COMMENT columnComment from information_schema.TABLES t left join information_schema.COLUMNS c on t.TABLE_SCHEMA=c.TABLE_SCHEMA and t.TABLE_NAME=c.TABLE_NAME where t.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{db} AND t.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
